ModMetaData.name: The Second Seat - Narrator Personification Framework
ModMetaData.author: The Second Seat Team
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]The Second Seat - Narrator Personification Framework[/h1]
A comprehensive framework for creating personified AI narrators in RimWorld.
[h2]Core Features[/h2] - AI-powered narrator with personality system - Dynamic portrait and expression system - Layered portrait support with multiple expressions - Affinity system tracking player relationship - Event-driven narrative generation - Batch command execution via natural language - Multi-modal analysis for custom personas - Extensible API for custom narrator personas
[h2]For Players[/h2] This mod provides a framework with built-in vanilla narrators (Cassandra, Phoebe, Randy, etc.). For custom narrator personas (like Sideria), install additional persona mods.
[h2]For Mod Developers[/h2] Create custom narrator personas by: - Defining personas via XML (no coding required) - Adding custom portraits and expressions - Configuring dialogue styles and event preferences - Leveraging the full framework API
See example: "The Second Seat - Sideria Example" mod
[h2]Technical Requirements[/h2] - RimWorld 1.4+ - LLM API access (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Gemini, or local models) - Optional: Azure TTS for voice synthesis
───────────────────────────────────────
[h1]第二席位 - 叙事者人格化框架[/h1]
为RimWorld打造的全面叙事者人格化框架。
[h2]核心功能[/h2] - AI驱动的人格化叙事者 - 动态头像和表情系统 - 分层立绘支持，多表情切换 - 好感度系统追踪玩家关系 - 事件驱动的叙事生成 - 自然语言批量命令执行 - 多模态分析生成自定义人格 - 可扩展API，支持自定义叙事者人格
[h2]面向玩家[/h2] 此Mod提供框架和内置原版叙事者（Cassandra、Phoebe、Randy等）。 要使用自定义叙事者人格（如Sideria），请安装额外的人格Mod。
[h2]面向Mod开发者[/h2] 创建自定义叙事者人格： - 通过XML定义人格（无需编程） - 添加自定义头像和表情 - 配置对话风格和事件偏好 - 利用完整的框架API
示例参考："The Second Seat - Sideria Example" Mod
[h2]技术要求[/h2] - RimWorld 1.4+ - LLM API访问（OpenAI、DeepSeek、Gemini或本地模型） - 可选：Azure TTS语音合成
